name: 80's Style Stained Glass Necklace
description:
This is a hand cut, custom made stained glass pendant. It's original design is decorated with LEAD FREE silver solder, then brushed with a black patina. It's unique shape allows you to wear it with jeans or a dress.

If you would like this gift wrapped please write so in a message to seller. We can put a little note or a "to and from" tag on it also.

name: Stained Glass Necklace
description:
This is a lovely example of just how amazing stained glass can be. This piece is wrapped with copper foil then lead free solder is applied. The bead hanging is from our friends at http://www.etsy.com/people/SecondChanceBeads. The bead is made from recycled paper and coated with polyurethane. This pendant comes on a simple cotton rope with adjustable knots tied at each end!

Measures 2 1/2" x 3/4"

If you would like this gift wrapped please write so in a message to seller. We can put a little note or a "to and from" tag on it also.

name: Stained Glass Iridescent Heart Pendant
description:
This pendant is made from a very interesting, iridescent piece of stained glass. One side has a gradual grade of black lines. The other is iridescent. Looks super great both ways.
This pendant comes on a simple cotton rope with a claw clasp.

If you would like this gift wrapped please write so in a message to seller. We can put a little note or a "to and from" tag on it also.

Thanks for looking!

name: Stained Glass Pendant
description:
This necklace is made from beautiful, hand cut, stained glass. It's original shape is decorated with silver solder and brushed with a black patina. Hangs on a great brass chain with clasp.

This necklace is also reversible, allowing you to wear it two different ways!!

If you would like this gift wrapped, please write so in a message to seller. We can put a little note or a "to and from" tag on it also.

name: Stained Glass Heart Pendant
description:
Wear your heart on the outside. This adorable stained glass necklace goes with just about everything. Made from a vibrant red stained glass. Comes with a simple cotton string with adjustable knot on each end.

Measures 2 1/2" x 3"

If you would like this gift wrapped please write so in a message to seller. We can put a little note or a "to and from" tag on it also.
